疏.definition: to dredge; to clear away obstruction; thin; sparse; scanty; distant (relation); not close; to neglect; negligent; to present a memorial to the Emperor; commentary; annotation

疏不見親.definition: lit. casual aquaintances should not come between relatives; blood is thicker than water (idiom)

疏勒.definition: Shule ancient name for modern Kashgar; Shule county in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

疏勒國.definition: Shule, oasis state in central Asia (near modern Kashgar) at different historical periods

疏勒縣.definition: Shule county in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

疏導.definition: to dredge; to open up a path for; to remove obstructions; to clear the way; to enlighten; persuasion

疏忽.definition: to neglect; to overlook; negligence; carelessness

疏忽大意.definition: oversight; negligence; careless; negligent; not concentrating on the main point

疏挖.definition: to dredge; to dig out (a channel)

疏放.definition: eccentric; self-indulgent; free and unconventional (written style); unbuttoned

疏散.definition: to scatter; to disperse; to evacuate; scattered; sparse

疏散措施.definition: evacuation; measures to evacuate a building in an emergency

疏於.definition: to fail to pay sufficient attention to; to be negligent in regard to; to be lacking in

疏於防範.definition: to neglect to take precautions; relaxed vigilance

疏果.definition: to thin fruit (to increase fruit size etc)

疏水簞瓢.definition: little water and few utensils; to live a frugal life (idiom)

疏漏.definition: to slip up; to overlook by negligence; careless omission; oversight

疏理.definition: to clarify (disparate material into a coherent narrative); to marshal an argument

疏疏.definition: sparse; blurred; old for 楚楚[chu3 chu3]; neat; lovely

疏而不漏.definition: loose, but allows no escape (idiom, from Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]); the way of Heaven is fair, but the guilty will not escape

疏肝理氣.definition: to course the liver and rectify 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)

疏解.definition: to mediate; to mitigate; to ease; to relieve

疏財仗義.definition: distributing money, fighting for virtue (idiom); fig. generous in helping the needy

疏財重義.definition: distributing money, supporting virtue (idiom); fig. to give generously in a public cause

疏通.definition: to unblock; to dredge; to clear the way; to get things flowing; to facilitate; to mediate; to lobby; to explicate (a text)

疏遠.definition: to drift apart; to become estranged; to alienate; estrangement

疏闊.definition: inaccurate; slipshod; poorly thought-out; distant; vague; long-separated; broadly scattered

疏附.definition: Shufu county in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

疏附縣.definition: Shufu county in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

疏離.definition: to become alienated; estranged; alienation; disaffection; set wide apart
